name: aruco-ts
description: A TypeScript implementation of js-aruco, designed for developers interested in augmented reality and computer vision, providing tools for marker detection and tracking in WebAR applications.

scripts.bench: tsc benchmarks/math-performance.bench.ts --outDir .bench --module commonjs --target ES2020 --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule && node .bench/benchmarks/math-performance.bench.js && node benchmarks/cleanup.js

author: Walter Perdan <github@kalwaltart.it>
